Uses of Package
GP.src

  • Classes in GP.src used by GP.src
    Class
    Description
    Bill
    This class deals with the bill of the order
    BillCSV
    Class reads and writes to BILL.csv
    BookingsList
    The class that holds CustomerInformation in a List of Bookings
    Course
    The class deals with the various Courses of the menu
    CustomerInformation
    Holds information used for bookings
    CustomerInformationCSV
    This class is used to read the customer information from a CSV file and store it in an array.
    Menu
    The class creates menus that can be used in the restaurant
    MenuItem
    This class creates menuItem objects (food or drink)
    Order
    Class deals with taking Orders and checking on order status
    Order.setStatus
    enum used as these variables are unchangeable and are used to set the status of the order
    OrderList
    Creates a place to store orders and remove them when complete
    Restaurant
    Class creates restaurant (used for multiple restaurants in a chain)
    RestaurantInterface
    This class is the interface for the restaurant.
    Staff
    Creates staff object
    Table
    This class deals with the creation of tables in a restaurant
    TableCSV
    This class is used to read and write CSV files for Table.
